ComicInfo.Summary: New Life: Sara has given up the Witchblade to protect her unborn child but finds she has to make a major adjustment as she returns to police work without her mystic weapon. Gleason comes over to make Sara dinner but they end up going to bed together instead. Danielle gets a visit from her mother, Sara's boss, Captain Peyroux.

ComicInfo.Title: New Life
